subject: Re: Question
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
It probably would help, but may just take some patience, and 
practice. This stuff can be done on the extreme cheap. Several here 
have had good sussess with just using an AM or FM radio, tuning it 
slowly by hand while recording wiht the intention of getting EVP. I 
always announce I'm doing an EVP recording, then tell thenm when I'm 
stopping. it's kind of the Mini Box in manula mode. You can record 
eiterh from the speaker, or a hearphone/line ouput jack. 
there's alos EVPmaker, and well as a number of other simple EVP 
method, such as using running water as background sound. 

 Frank
